Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 48th overall pick, by Gashouse in 1969...
Injured on 6/1/1970 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 6/9/1970 with a Fractured Hip, out for 10-11 weeks...
Traded from Gashouse to Diablo on 7/21/1970 (Going to GHG: C J. Holm. Going to DIA: C A. Severs, CF J. Brown)...
Released by Diablo on 11/3/1976...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 11/3/1976 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1977, off Jaime Lucky (LP)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/1977, off Michael Patnaude (GHG)...
Injured on 6/30/1977 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1977...
Released by Halifax on 6/23/1981...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 3/1/1982 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 6/6/1985 with a Broken Foot, out for 10 weeks...
